description.en: Attacks an enemy, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>.
description.jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間付与する。
description.zh: 攻击敌人,并对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>诅咒</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>。

description.en: Attacks all enemies. Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>, and grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>.
description.kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여하고, 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 증가합니다.
description.jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。対象に<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を3ターンの間付与し、自分の<color=#28d9ed>効果命中</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
description.zh: 攻击全体敌人。对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>诅咒</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>,并使自身<color=#28d9ed>效果命中</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>。

description.en: Attacks all enemies, and <color=#28d9ed>detonates</color> all Cursed stacks on the target. Then, when the target's Health is 70% or less, ignores Immunity, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description.kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 대상의 저주를 모두 <color=#28d9ed>폭발</color> 시킵니다. 이후 체력이 70% 이하인 적은 면역을 무시하고 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>빙결</color>상태가 됩니다.
description.jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象の呪いをすべて<color=#28d9ed>破裂</color>させる。その後、残りHPが70%以下の敵の免疫を無視し、<color=#28d9ed>凍結</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
description.zh: 攻击全体敌人,并使目标受到的所有诅咒效果<color=#28d9ed>爆炸</color>。此后无视生命值在70%以下敌人的免疫效果,并使其陷入<color=#28d9ed>冰冻</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

description.en:
(Passive Effect)
When attacking while granted increased <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color>, ignores Immunity of all enemies, and additionally inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>9 turn(s)</color>.
When attacking, if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color>, penetrates the target's Defense by <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>, and enemies killed by this skill cannot be Resurrected or Revived.
Right after all attacks of Harshna, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
description.kr:
(패시브 효과)
<color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>이 증가한 상태에서 공격 시 적 전체에게 면역을 무시하고 <color=#28d9ed>9턴</color> 동안 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 추가로 부여합니다. 
공격 시 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>빙결</color> 상태라면 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 무시하고, 부활 및 소생이 불가능합니다.
하르슈나의 모든 공격 직후에는 적의 반격, 복수, 신속 대응이 발동하지 않습니다.
description.jp:
(パッシブ効果)
<color=#28d9ed>効果的中</color>がUPした状態で攻撃時、敵全体に免疫を無視する、解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>9ターン</color>の間追加で付与する。
攻撃対象が<color=#28d9ed>凍結</color>状態の場合、対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>無視し、復活と蘇生ができなくなる。
【ハルシュナ】のスキルでは敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。
description.zh:
(被动效果)
处于<color=#28d9ed>效果命中</color>提升状态下攻击时,无视全体敌人的免疫效果,并额外造成无法解除的<color=#28d9ed>诅咒</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>9回合</color>。
攻击时,若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>冰冻</color>状态,则无视目标防御力的<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>,且无法触发复活与苏醒效果。
赫索纳的所有攻击后,不会触发敌人的反击、复仇、迅速应对效果。
